Key Match Events: Clase retired Judge on a flyout
Clase struck out Stanton with a swinging strikeout
Clase retired Cabrera on a groundout after Chisholm’s two-out single
Pre-Game Insights: Vogt expressed his unwavering support for Emmanuel Clase and stated he would be back out in the ninth
Speculation arose about whether Vogt might stick with Clase if the Guardians encountered another high-leverage situation in the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Vogt praised Clase as the best closer on the planet
Vogt mentioned that the decision to let Clase go back out for the 10th was difficult due to his workload over the past three days
Rocchio expressed regret for missing the potential double-play ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Clase leaned heavily on his cutter, averaging 100 mph
The bullpen combined for 42 strikeouts and 13 walks in 33 2/3 innings throughout the postseason
Six of the seven homers allowed by Cleveland’s bullpen in the ALCS came in the ALCS
